# identifier

**Instance Property**

The unique identifier for the highlight.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var identifier: any NSCopying & NSSecureCoding { get }
```

## Viewing highlight attributes

- **url**: The surfaced content URL for the highlight.
